text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Coordinating and realizing urination or defecation, such as indicating the need, getting into the right position, finding and reaching a suitable spot, manipulating clothing before and after urination, and cleaning up (the body) afterwards.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-AbilityToUseToilet.ToiletUse](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-AbilityToUseToilet.ToiletUse) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
